feature_model.name: Advice
feature_model.feature_tree: :r Advice (f_Advice) :m Tutoring (f_Tutoring) :m Feedback (f_Feedback) :m IntelligentTutoring (f_IntelligentTutoring) :o Tutoring lecture (f_Tutoring_lecture) :o User Authentication (f_User_Authentication) :o Result Monitoring (f_Result_Monitoring) :g [1, *] : Student (f_Student) : Instructor (f_Instructor) :o Grading (f_Grading) :g [1, *] : tutoring simulation (f_tutoring_simulation) : Tutoring exercise (f_Tutoring_exercise)
